content.html: If your account setup includes email validation (and it should), do NOT allow actions in your app until after the person verifies their email. On another note, I woke up to several offers on the truck I’m apparently selling, on the website I apparently registered on.
content.value:
If your account setup includes email validation (and it should), do NOT allow actions in your app until after the person verifies their email. 

On another note, I woke up to several offers on the truck I’m apparently selling, on the website I apparently registered on.
